summary: Maintaining an adequate mental health workforce is critical for the Department of Veterans Affairs to meet the rising demand for its mental health services. VA expects this demand to grow further, estimating that veterans' mental health conditions got worse during the COVID-19 pandemic. VA started hiring licensed counselors and marriage and family therapists in 2010, which can help meet its mental health hiring goals. It...
title: Veterans Health Care: Efforts to Hire Licensed Professional Mental Health Counselors and Marriage and Family Therapists
